attributes.action: Object to the one sided promotion of the remain in the EU campaign.
attributes.additional_details: This information is reported by the Daily Telegraph on its web site tonight, 6th April.
attributes.background: Tonight it is reported on the Daily Telegraph web site that the remain in Europe campaign will be spending taxpayer funded £9.3 million on a leaflet to support its case, approved by the Prime Minister. There is no intention to similarly fund the Brexit campaign.
